Class Door

  • java.lang.Object
    • Door

  • public class Door
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Door creates a Door that has a Point location and a boolean isLocked
    Since:
    July 21, 2019

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Door()
      Default constructor sets default location to (1,0) , and isLocked to true, a locked door
      Door(Door d)
      Copy constructor sets the location of the door to be the same as Door d, with the same locked boolean status.
      Door(int x, int y)
      Input constructor sets the location by x,y coordinate pair input and isLocked is defaulted to true, a locked door
      Door(int x, int y, boolean locked)
      Input constructor sets the location by x,y coordinate pair input and isLocked to the boolean value of locked.
      Door(Point p)
      Point Input constructor sets the location of the door with a Point p and boolean isLocked set to a default value of true
      Door(Point p, boolean locked)
      Point Input constructor sets the location of the door with a Point p and boolean isLocked set to input value locked

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getIsLocked()
      Accessor gets the boolean value of isLocked variable
      Point getLocation()
      Accessor returns a Point with the location of the door
      void setIsLocked(boolean value)
      Mutator sets the isLocked boolean to value
      void setLocation(int x, int y)
      Mutator sets the door location to be the same x,y coordinates as the input coordinates x and y
      void setLocation(Point p)
      Mutator sets the door location to be the same x,y coordinates as point p

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Door

        public Door()
        Default constructor sets default location to (1,0) , and isLocked to true, a locked door

      • Door

        public Door(int x,
            int y,
            boolean locked)
        Input constructor sets the location by x,y coordinate pair input and isLocked to the boolean value of locked.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the door location
        y - the y-coordinate of the door location
        locked - boolean that decleares the door locked if true open if false

      • Door

        public Door(int x,
            int y)
        Input constructor sets the location by x,y coordinate pair input and isLocked is defaulted to true, a locked door
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the door location
        y - the y-coordinate of the door location

      • Door

        public Door(Point p,
            boolean locked)
        Point Input constructor sets the location of the door with a Point p and boolean isLocked set to input value locked
        Parameters:
        p - A point location for the door
        locked - a boolean value for whether the door is locked or open locked if true, open if false

      • Door

        public Door(Point p)
        Point Input constructor sets the location of the door with a Point p and boolean isLocked set to a default value of true
        Parameters:
        p - A point location for the door

      • Door

        public Door(Door d)
        Copy constructor sets the location of the door to be the same as Door d, with the same locked boolean status.
        Parameters:
        d - A Door class object

    • Method Detail

      • getIsLocked

        public boolean getIsLocked()
        Accessor gets the boolean value of isLocked variable
        Returns:
        returns the boolean value of isLocked the state of the door true if locked false if open

      • getLocation

        public Point getLocation()
        Accessor returns a Point with the location of the door
        Returns:
        returns a Point with the location of the door, this is a copy/clone variable returned.

      • setIsLocked

        public void setIsLocked(boolean value)
        Mutator sets the isLocked boolean to value
        Parameters:
        value - the boolean value to set isLocked to true if locked false if open.

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(Point p)
        Mutator sets the door location to be the same x,y coordinates as point p
        Parameters:
        p - a Point location of where to place the door.

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(int x,
                        int y)
        Mutator sets the door location to be the same x,y coordinates as the input coordinates x and y
        Parameters:
        x - an integer x-coordinate to place the door.
        y - an integer y-coordinate to place the door.
